manhattan.waveformdata

クラス BasicIDFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • manhattan.waveformdata.BasicIDFile

  • public final class BasicIDFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for a pair of an ID file and a waveform file. The files are for observed and synthetic waveforms (NOT partial)
    The file contains
    Numbers of stations, events and period ranges
    Each station information
    - name, network, position
    Each event
    - Global CMT ID Each period
    Each period range
    - min period, max period
    Each BasicID information
    - see in readBasicIDFile(Path)
    導入されたバージョン:
    2013/12/1 or earlier
    バージョン:
    0.3
    作成者:
    kensuke
    関連項目:
    BasicID}

    • メソッドの詳細

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Options: -a: show all IDs
        パラメータ:
        args - [option] [id file name]
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • readBasicIDandDataFile

        public static BasicID[] readBasicIDandDataFile(java.nio.file.Path idPath,
                                               java.nio.file.Path dataPath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        idPath - Path of an ID file, if it does not exist, an IOException
        dataPath - Path of an data file, if it does not exist, an IOException
        戻り値:
        Array of BasicID containing waveform data
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error happens,

      • readBasicIDFile

        public static BasicID[] readBasicIDFile(java.nio.file.Path idPath)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        idPath - Path of an ID file
        戻り値:
        Array of BasicID without waveform data
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
